episode_summary: In this episode, Tony Clark shares how he achieved over $40 million in sales in his first 18 months as a REALTOR by focusing on investment real estate and implementing effective systems. He discusses the importance of identifying a niche, understanding client needs, and using a CRM to streamline operations and improve lead conversion. Tony also introduces his new CRM, Realty Flow, designed to simplify real estate business processes.
